body:
Ye I have my Birthday today and I just want to crave for more attention xD

First of Thanks to everyone that was/is  gratulating me on skype!
Thank you! Very much luv for ya <3

But since I rarely make any AMAs I think it's an appropriate reason to do so.
So ask Away!

title: Happy Birthday Flo! [AMA]

replies.body:

replies.body:
I see what you did there ;)
Idk I was 11 or 12 (5 - 4 years ago xD) and I was at my uncle that had minecraft, he showed me how to play it and every time I was at him I played.
My friend showed me the server around July/August 2013 (Where it still was MCZone, I still remember the stone lobby that was floating in the void). We played a bit Nebula, but then I forgot about the server. Around November I remembered the Game and searched for it and found avicus, since then I made some maps xD
My favourite Gamemode is CTH, I love the kits and the target to control the hill. Oh and it gives you overall the most credits)
Civil or Architekt
Pizza and Nutella
Purple
My bed xD
November, I love how it is spelled xD
